response.job_title: Software Development Sr Analyst en Mercado Libre
response.summary: Software developer with two years of experience in web projects, passionate about computer issues and modern technology, critical thinking, effective verbal and written communication, dedicated to on-time delivery, ability to learn autonomously while offering technological solutions with a strong interdisciplinary component.
response.skills: Metodologías ágiles, Scrum, JavaScript, Node.js, React.js, HTML5, Hojas de estilos en cascada (CSS), Lenguaje SASS, Bootstrap, AJAX, Trabajo en equipo, Vuejs, TypeScript, Desarrollo de páginas web (Back-End), Git, Aplicaciones web, Desarrollo web, Desarrollo del front-end, Programación, Programación orientada a objetos (OOP)

profile_positions.description:
Exposed to daily and real development challenges for large American companies.

Responsible for the development and maintaining of web applications for large US editorial company ensuring quality and performance, teamwork with agile methodologies and use of git-flow as a branching system as well as reviewing and approving code to the final integration.

Knowledge of continuous integration by being continuously part of the deployments of the application.

I've been of communities where knowledge is shared about technologies and advances in the area of ​​development.
profile_positions.title: Front-End Developer

profile_positions.description:
I gained experience as part of internal projects in the company that used front-end technologies and agile methodologies.

I had different training related to the world of software development as design patterns, clean code, TDD as well as technologies like javascript, Reactjs, Nodejs in a professional and real developing environment.
profile_positions.title: Developer Internship

company.name: Mercado Libre
company.description:
Founded in 1999 and headquartered in Buenos Aires, Argentina, Mercado Libre is Latin America’s leading e-commerce technology company.  Through its primary platforms, MercadoLibre.com and MercadoPago.com, it provides solutions to individuals and companies buying, selling, advertising, and paying for goods online.    
Mercado Libe serves millions of users and creates a market for a wide variety of goods and services in an easy, safe and efficient way.  
MercadoLibre maintains a leadership position in 18 Latin American countries.  The Company listed on Nasdaq (NASDAQ: MELI) following its initial public offering in 2007.
